attributes.action: NOT Compensate Investors in failled Banks (such as Bradford and Bingley)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Shareholders in Banks are defacto part owners.  They enjoy the profits and dividends when things are good, and should therefore expect to share in the losses when things are bad.

The Government has a duty to ensure Savers are protected, not owners.
